
   html,
        body {
            height: 100%;
        }
        body {
            background-color: #fff;
            font: 14px/1.5 Arial, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, sans-serif;
            color: #000;
            margin: 0;
        }
        h1 {
            margin: 0;
            font-size: 27px;
            font-weight: 300;
            line-height: 30px;
        }
        h4 {
            font-size: 14px;
            line-height: 20px;
            margin: 0 0 16px;
        }
        a {
            text-decoration: none;
            color: #0091d9;
            outline: none;
        }
        p {
            margin: 10px 0;
            line-height: 20px;
        }
        ul {
            list-style: none;
            margin: 0 0 20px 20px;
            padding: 0;
        }
        ul li {
            position: relative;
            margin: 0 0 9px 0;
        }
        ul > li:before {
            position: absolute;
            left: -20px;
            top: 0;
            content: '\2014\a0';
        }
        .container {
            height: 100%;
            text-align: center;
            font-size: 0;
            line-height: 0;
        }
            .container:before {
                vertical-align: middle;
                height: 100%;
                display: inline-block;
                content: '';
            }
        .content {
            position: relative;
            display: inline-block;
            max-width: 772px;
            min-width: 639px;
            padding: 90px 20px 90px 125px;
            vertical-align: middle;
            text-align: left;
            font: 14px/1.5 Arial, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, sans-serif;
        }

        /* @link /s/a/i/logo/logo-avito.svg */
        .logo {
            background-image: url(data:image/svg+xml;base64,);
            background-repeat: no-repeat;
            background-position: 50% 50%;
            background-size: 100% auto;
            position: absolute;
            top: 40px;
            left: 37px;
            width: 115px;
            height: 30px;
        }

        /* @link /s/a/i/logo/logo-avito.png */
        .lte-ie8 .logo {
            background-image: url(data:image/png;base64,);
            background-size: auto auto;
        }
        @media only screen and (max-width: 800px) {
            .container {
                padding: 0 30px;
            }
                .container:before {
                    display: none;
                }
            .content {
                width: 100%;
                max-width: auto;
                min-width: auto;
                margin: 90px 0 0;
                padding: 0;
                text-align: left;
            }
            .logo {
                top: 30px;
                left: 30px;
            }
        }
  
   .section {
            margin-top: 26px;
        }
        .description {
            margin-bottom: 44px;
        }

            background-repeat: no-repeat;
